website_summaries.verdict: This smoker allows you to connect your smoking experience to your smart device.
pros: App allows you to monitor temperatures
Large capacity allows you to smoke a lot of meat at once
Wood chips can be added from the side without opening the main door
cons: Some users have problems getting the app to work well

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for awhile
customer_reviews.text: The smoker worked great for awhile. We used it maybe a dozen times. Then it just quit. It would keep shutting itself off. When we looked online for a solution we found that quite a few other people also experienced this issue. The only way to fix it would be to replace several interior parts. My son's smoker ( also a Masterbuilt) lasted less than a year. Unless the company can fix this issue, we will not be buying another smoker from Masterbuilt.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: receive the item and it never heated up past 200 the warranty is completely insane . Called master built and they said they would only send out replacement parts.. those did not work either. They then send you more parts but is still not fixing the problem instead of just giving me a new one I have now spent $300 and have no smoker And master built wont do anything. I also purchased the extended warranty through Square trade but they won’t touch it until after the year warranty is up
customer_reviews.author: Hairaholic

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is a waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a chance to put this thing together and will give it a try for Father's Day.This review will be an ongoing process as I see them. Not too difficult to put together even for an old guy with few live brain cells remaining. The only negative so far is BLUETOOTH ... virtually worthless! Get the connection and all is well while I'm standing right in front of the smoker as soon as I get foot inside to get out of the summer heat, bluetooth shuts down. If I have to stand in front of the unit anyway, why have Bluetooth? WiFi would be a MUCH better option.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Well built electric smoker
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review item until it was used many times and I have to say I love it. It was easy to assemble and works without any issues. It is well made and easy to clean after smoking. Many complained about having Bluetooth issues but I have not had any using the app on my iPhone. It holds a lot of meats inside and it cooks and smokes meats very well and does not produce a lot of smoke outside of the smoker only when you open the door does the smoke filter out
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The smoker works fine but the app doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The smoker works fine but the app doesn't work, so the remote control functionality that you pay a premium for is wasted. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: JayDub

customer_reviews.title: Has been great so far
customer_reviews.text: Has been great so far, bluetooth is working great and very convenient, I love it. I did have to buy the cold smoke attachment. I could not get consistent smoke without it when operating the smoker below 160 degrees; the heating element wasn't on enough to keep the chips smoldering. But, that is because I am mostly smoking salmon. For chicken and beef, it worked great without the cold smoke attachment. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: zackos

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer lasted two weeks. The Bluetooth only reaches about 15 feet. Get the cheaper model without these things they don't work and aren't worth the money. Make sure you get the cover for this and wrap the insides with aluminum foil to make clean up easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most of it still works
customer_reviews.text: Smoker overall is great. The Bluetooth is cool and is full for awhile but the internal probe stopped working after a bit so I had to buy a separate one after about 6 months. When it showed up the box looked like it had been Ace Ventura style shipped and the machine was dented but I couldn’t wait for another one as I wanted to use it right away so Amazon was very helpful to acknowledge my issues. I recommend it easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Smoker died
customer_reviews.text: So I am extremely dissatisfied in my purchase. I brought this smoker then I bought a $35 12 pound brisket to smoke for 30+ people 3 hours into smoking it the smoker completly dies... no reason or explanation faulty equipment. It was terrible so so sad! I am obviously returning this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!! It showed up before we planned & after set up, we love it..... it cooks great!!! Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris D.

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker! Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker! Easy to use. I love the control you have over the temperature. The wood chip drawer works great. Generates a lot of smoke from few chips. This is the second none I've bought. The first was for my son, and he uses it extensively. Th!e videos offer great advice and recipes!
customer_reviews.author: David Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this smoker. He loves the Bluetooth and being able to keep an eye on it even when he’s not standing next to it. I’m not fond of smokes foods but the tri tip is really good. I’d say it works awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Soooo much easier to make smoked meats now!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bluetooth function, make it easy to monitor without having to go to the unit itself. The app isn't too bad either as I use it to set the alarms for adding wood chips. The taste is great but not as good making it with charcoal but so much less hassle and baby sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Smoking is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple of years ago as a present for the in-laws. They only used it once and they gave it back to us this year. I love it. They didn’t want to invest the time it takes to smoke. But I love it. Super easy to use. Love the Bluetooth option. We’ve had a regular smoker before and that was too much work. This makes smoking food so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for first time users
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and easy to use smoker... this is my first go round... I made the right choice. I wish the Bluetooth had a further reach, but, other than that minimal complaints.
customer_reviews.author: mnmarkos

customer_reviews.title: First round
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I'm a beginner and this is perfect for anyone getting started. Holds solid temp and the Bluetooth works flawlessly, it assembled quick and has been lots of fun to work with.
customer_reviews.author: E-Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: The smoker itself is great though if these features are not important to you
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth could never connect to the app on my LG V20 and the built in thermometer is not very reliable. The smoker itself is great though if these features are not important to you. I highly recoment the extended smoker attachment for this unit to make it less annoying.
customer_reviews.author: WTK

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to figure out how to smoke various meats with this smoker. I tend to overcook the chicken and the meat dries out. Giving myself time to figure it out. Cleaning/maintenance is a bit of work.
customer_reviews.author: JW1970

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth does not work, has issues burning chips.
customer_reviews.text: I have the cold smoke kit on order, it would not keep the chips lit. Also the bluetooth will not work. I have contacted them about these issues and have gotten no reply. Im not a fan of the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Vz iPhone

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS AWESOME, THE BLUETOOTH FUNCTION IS PRETTY DECENT I HAD ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS WORKS AWESOME, THE BLUETOOTH FUNCTION IS PRETTY DECENT I HAD AN ISSUE AND SUBMITTED A COMPLAINT THROUGH MASTERBUILT AND THE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Been using an Akorn Kamado with great success for years
customer_reviews.text: Been using an Akorn Kamado with great success for years. Thought this would be a nice "shortcut" on long cooks. WRONG. Either the thermostat or the heating element, or BOTH, are defective. Confirmed with my RediChek sensor. Unfortunately, you only have 30 days to return and I am now out of range. Complete waste of money. Shame on you Amazon and MasterBuilt.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Quality is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I have had this smoker for 8 months and now it is dead. Tried to contact manufacturer but did not help. I guess they feel smoking about 20 items for a couple hundred bucks is a good deal. Totally disappointed. Looking for another manufacturer that has better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a year now electrical hazard
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a year, now shocks you when you touch it. Contacted master built not even a response. Wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: I like the smoker. I have had it about four months and i am using it right now. I like it. The only thing I would change would be the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The pork butt he smoked was amazing! Already know we'll be using this once a ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband went on Facebook and joined a Masterbuilt smoker group. The pork butt he smoked was amazing! Already know we'll be using this once a month!
customer_reviews.author: UGOGRN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker purchased as a gift and has proven to be a very popular item that has functioned flawlessly even though often used.
customer_reviews.author: Dunbar Henri

customer_reviews.title: App is too broken to use
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother buying the Bluetooth version. The app will randomly jack the temp up to 899... and it has been broken for awhile (check the app store reviews). That's simply inexcusable. The smoker itself seems OK. Assembly was easy. Minor alignment issues with the bolt holes for the wheels on the back but the underside boots are adequate. Seems to work fine too. Overall it's about what you'd expect for a budget made-in-China product: passable with lots of corner cutting and minimum acceptable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smoker! My wife wishes the bluetooth actually worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smoker! My wife wishes the bluetooth actually worked though. The smoker does work like a charm though and cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Husband new pride and joy.
customer_reviews.text: Love mastebuilt. Hubby love the blue tooth. loves the glass door. Smokes great no problems NO ones allowed to borrow this one.
customer_reviews.author: karla b.

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. Works perfectly does a great job smoking. Wish I found this sooner. Lots of room to smoke loads of food. Bluetooth works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: super easy to use, consistent temps. AHve not used the app yet, it had pretty low ratings but really not sure why I would need it.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Smokes chicken and ribs well. I love the temperature probe is a wonder I LOVE IT. It allows me to check temps without opening the door. I'm having problems with the remote app but it did work the first time not sure what I did wrong after that.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Had a husband who did not like to grill ribs
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is fabulous! Had a husband who did not like to grill ribs. Once he used this machine and smoked the ribs, it was like nirvana. Only a moron who doesn't read directions could screw their food up. Chicken, roast and even a steak----if you can believe it----were all scrumptious so far. Can't wait to do a turkey. SHARING THE LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L Honore

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted this for his birthday and he is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this for his birthday and he is very happy with it. I like the smoked meat he makes with it. Just don’t keep it too close to the house or the house smells like a smoker too LOL
customer_reviews.author: Debra J.

customer_reviews.title: Love our new smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love our new smoker, the Bluetooth is awesome, the whole process is low maintenance, great food and easy clean up! I recommend covering the water pan in foil before filling for easier clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Died in under 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: Great electric smoker, However, we have had it just under 3 years and it just died. For the amount of money I would have expected it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: MoodyMom4

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest mistake I made when I ordered it I recieved the wrong one since then I had a bracket that the weld broke on and now the built in thermometer quit working wouldn't reccomend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift to my husband, and he ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband, and he LOVES it. We've used it 5 or 6 times with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: I wood recommend it to my friends
customer_reviews.text: I works very well! You have to watch it because sometimes the temperature will go up higher than the setting, but as long as you don't leave ot alone for 30 minutes or an hour it works perfectly. The bluetooth works very well. It makes som heavy smoke with a small amount fo chips. I wood recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY ANY MASTERBUILT SMOKERS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Second Masterbuilt. Both stopped working after 3-4 uses. Replace thermostat and heating element in both and they still would not work properly. Stay away from Masterbuilt smokers!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Van Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker and really well built
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. New to smoking meats and this smoker makes learning very easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes great brisket, take your time and foil line the ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes great brisket, take your time and foil line the interior. Purchased a cover it keeps blowing off, put something heavy on top to stop this.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeJeff

customer_reviews.title: i still love
customer_reviews.text: 2 briskets and 3 bacon slabs later, i still love it
customer_reviews.author: richard peters

customer_reviews.title: Wow amazing smoker
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is amazing. Great temperature control and you can watch your smoker from your phone. If you are in the market for a smoker, consider this one. It’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked right
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a year and 4 months ago. First time I used it in over 6 months now -- I have used it a total of about 6 times -- and now it has the run-away temperature problem so many others have had. The meat it makes when it is working right is fantastic. Longevity of the smoker is questionable. Better watch your temperature. I set mine for 225 and the next thing I know it is at 300 degrees. Reset and then it happens again. Finished my brisquet wrapped in the oven instead of the smoker. OK, so.... what is broken? Does it need a new control panel or what? Aggravating for a $500 purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Md

customer_reviews.title: Bag Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on 2/2017, it worked great for 5 times, today is died (6/2/2018) BR Harry
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Helps you gain weight!!!  But, it is fun while you are doing it.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Product!! I have gained 6 lbs in a month - Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Shortly after receiving it I put it together and then decided it was worth a try. Worked super well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Young

customer_reviews.title: Set and forget
customer_reviews.text: Needed a reliable electric smoker that I could set and forget, low maintenance temp control. This baby delivers! My first rack of ribs came out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Although the original packaging had some damage and the latch was broken, the manufacturer was easily reachable via email and quickly sent a replacement latch. Smoker works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: I use a regular smoker but wanted easy so I purchased this one. I am really impressed that everything I have cooked is really moist, even the ribs.
customer_reviews.author: mwop

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker, temp control probe and Wi-Fi work great
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker, temp control probe and Wi-Fi work great, so much for keeping glass on the front clean though, lol
customer_reviews.author: trey haberman

customer_reviews.title: Broken App
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the bluetooth feature, there is a known bug with the app that causes the smoker to attempt to raise to 899*F. This happened the first time we tried the app. Too much of a hassle to return so we use it without the bluetooth app.
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Best smoker we've owned in 25yrs of smoking
customer_reviews.text: Best smoker we've owned in 25yrs of smoking!! Works incredibly well. We've smoked all kinds of meats including venison and also purchased the cold smoker attachment which gave us the ability to cold smoke delicious cheeses and fish too. Love love love, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: Efficient, sealed tight, uses less wood, but bluetooth has lost connection on me couple times...and I was no more than 20 feet away inside the house
customer_reviews.author: Jshoota

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: Broke after first use, warranty purchased and support staff was less than helpful. Never resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for my family
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st smoker I've owned. I did quite a bit a research and reading reviews. Since I'm a beginner, I have no complaints on this unit. It's perfect for my family. I will agree with other reviews that the Bluetooth is only good from no more than 15 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Vietz

customer_reviews.title: Works very good. I had a problem with the temperature holding ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very good. I had a problem with the temperature holding steady. The support line was very good and sent out a part to fix the problem right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice electric smoker
customer_reviews.text: nice smoker,does a great job makes great chicken leg quarters.would not buy a glass front door the next time,can not keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect even temperature. Handy temp probe was very accurate. Uses very little wood chips compared to a charcoal smoker.
customer_reviews.author: richard mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Like the smoker but it does not seem to cook ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the smoker but it does not seem to cook like my old Masterbuilt cooking time seem a lot longer and the Bluetooth does not seem to work very well
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son-in-law and he loved that it was bluetooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband's birthday in April. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday in April. He used it once successfully. The second time, two weeks later, it wouldn't heat up...he called Masterbuilt and was eventually sent a heating unit replacement. After he installed that, the smoker heated up, so we figured it worked. Nope. We just had to throw away an expensive brisket...the fourth time this smoker has been started in just two months of ownership, and it didn't work. It started heating, then stopped. Frustrating and not worth your aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Love cooking using my app on my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Love cooking using my app on my iPhone. Small and compact. We leave it outside, and bought a separate cover. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel K

customer_reviews.title: Great Backyard Fun
customer_reviews.text: Just received this smoker. Follow simple directions to season smoker. In a week I have smoked Salmon, Pork Ribs, Wild Pork tenderloins and some Brats.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. Fugleberg

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker! Easy to assemble, easy to clean, easy to use, and you can add wood chips with out opening smoker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: The best brought it for my husband he uses it all the time. The food comes out great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use & great quality meat!
customer_reviews.text: We got this smoker as present for my Brother in Law and it was an absolute hit! The smoker is so easy to use and everything that we have smoked so far (salmon, ribs, sausage) has been delicious! It is a great option/alternative to buying a regular smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great but the universal leg extensions did not fit and ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great but the universal leg extensions did not fit and I have not been able to find appropriate leg extensions for this model. No reply from masterbuilt either.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Snow

customer_reviews.title: Really like this unit but it came with a small dent ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this unit but it came with a small dent on the bottom right below the window. The app for the phone is outdated on IOS and the android app does not connect all the time.
customer_reviews.author: brent moritz

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC. Bluetooth has a low range
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC. Bluetooth has a low range. Sure wish it was WIFI connected...otherwise its an amazing smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product! The unit only heats up to so ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! The unit only heats up to so much and then stops. Would never buy again. Have to try and return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better qa
customer_reviews.text: Never got a chance to use it. Couldnt set it up.holes were not akigned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finger licking good. Only con
customer_reviews.text: My dad has already cooked 3 whole chickens and a turkey. Finger licking good. Only con, you can't leave it outside. You have to bring inside, especially if it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: and I'd recommend buying another thermometer to double check your temperatures
customer_reviews.text: App needs some improvement, and I'd recommend buying another thermometer to double check your temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Stella and Summit

customer_reviews.title: Just follow the general smoking guidelines and it’s away u go
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a lot of fun. I’ve only owned it for a month or so but I’ve used it every weekend since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: robert cottingham

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Bluetooth range could be better and sometimes have trouble connecting.
customer_reviews.author: CincyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality electronics
customer_reviews.text: Junk used once would not power on after first use
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Giard

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great so far and produced some great food but be ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Dad. Has worked great so far and produced some great food but be aware if you are buying this for the Bluetooth and app. The app appears to have many bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We've made some of the best dinners using this smoker! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ThE bOyS

customer_reviews.title: Love it and smoked some perfect salmon within days of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it and smoked some perfect salmon within days of delivery. Side loader, window, and Bluetooth....what mor can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: William Lucas

customer_reviews.title: I could use some help since I can't currently use this product.
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered in mid December but due to travels, I just recently tried to set it up. There is no "seller feedback" or contact info for this unit. The model I purchased is 20070115. However the product booklet and boxed accessories are for model 20070215 and I am missing parts as well as parts I have that are not even shown in the installation book so I cannot put together and operate! In addition I purchased a "stand" for it that I assembled only to find out it doesn't fit this model and that was not clear or I would not have purchased. Unsure where to go from here.
customer_reviews.author: The Barracuda

customer_reviews.title: all of the good reviews are accurate
customer_reviews.text: Pros: all of the good reviews are accurate. Cons: Bluetooth range makes it almost useless. Temperature probe on the large size
customer_reviews.author: T. Claus

customer_reviews.title: The smoker is great but came dented
customer_reviews.text: The smoker is great but came dented. In order to replace that issue we were going to have to repackage and send the entire thing back...quite the hassle considering the size. And that we read others kept getting back dents so what's the point? Either way, Smoker works great - light on outside isn't great when door is closed. Bluetooth works. My husband is thrilled by it.
customer_reviews.author: lisamarie_lmj

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved his gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his gift. He used it once and is now planning future meals! Clean up was not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Reinhart

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love this smoker. Smoked a bunch of different meats, and they all came out absolutely delicious and great... Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: eric papura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smoker! Can fit a ton of meat in at once. Would def recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Havent really played around much w/ the bluetooth stuff but the smoker is solid. well built. reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Suntis Sookying

customer_reviews.title: Bad app
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews the app won't connect to my phone
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bluetooth interface. I can sit in one room and monitor my food. The results are outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: John Beisner

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous piece of equipment. I bought it for my son for Father's Day. He has made some delicious meals
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous piece of equipment. I bought it for my son for Father's Day. He has made some delicious meals
customer_reviews.author: Judy Kroesen

customer_reviews.title: I was a little bumbed to find out there's only one internal thermometer rather that two like the second generation 30" (my dad h
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd smoker (2nd electric), and this thing is pure awesomeness! I was a little bumbed to find out there's only one internal thermometer rather that two like the second generation 30" (my dad has that one so that's how I know). But this one heats up fast and does a great job holding the set temperature. I've only had it for about 3 weeks now and have used it at least five times. It's definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: " but directions werre good and smoker
customer_reviews.text: "Some assembly required," but directions werre good and smoker, including bluetooth, is excellent...
customer_reviews.author: K. Alan Kelts

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied, works perfectly and makes amazing meats
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied, works perfectly and makes amazing meats. As with any smoker, it takes patience and experimentation but it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent! So easy to use and the meat comes out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: rayrayunc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but had a problem with my Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: jacki e zeitler

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!! Can do all my other chores and keep an eye on time and temp on my tablet. Bluetooth has about a 60-70 foot range which can sit on counter while preping rest of meal. Someday maybe they will have 2 separate built in meat probes :) I wrote this review a long time ago and never submitted. The unit was a pain to connect to my tablet but once is was connected the app seemed to work fine! Sounds like it has made a turn for the worse but I will update once I use it again.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: This Masterbuilt makes everything easy.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a smoker before. This Masterbuilt makes everything easy.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Grilled food, not slow smoked!
customer_reviews.text: Starts cooking and everything is fine. After a few hours the temp is a run away and starts climbing. you have to babysit this thing or you might as well use a grill. I have used it 4 times since 11-2017. the last two times the temp goes somewhere over 300 deg. if you shut it off and let it cool it will work ok for about 30 mins and then start grilling food again. Probably just try another brand if Masterbuilt wont help.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth feature sucks
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I didn't give a 5 star because the Bluetooth feature socks. You have to stand 5 feet away from it to work. Other than that the smoker performance is good.
customer_reviews.author: Triet Bui

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt 20072115 Bluetooth Smart Digital Electric Smoker, 30-Inch
product_meta.description: Size:30-Inch| Style:SmokerMasterbuilt has made smoking simple.and smart! Your handheld device becomes a remote control for your digital electric smoker with integrated Bluetooth Smart technology. You can power on/off, monitor and control cooking temperature and time, operate the food light and monitor the internal meat temperature - all from your smart device. Features:- Four chrome-coated smoking racks - smoke 80 lbs. of food!- Handheld device become a remote control for the smoker with integrated Bluetooth Smart technology- Blue LED digital control panel display with removable sun shade- Built-in meat probe thermometer for perfect results every time- Integrated thermostat temperature control for even, consistent smoking temperatures- High output LED lights illuminate food in low light when door is open- Front control panel design allows for more prepping space on top of the smoker- Patented side wood chip loading system to add chips without opening the smoker door- Removable water pan, drip pan, wood chip tray, and front acess grease pan for easy cleanup- Top air damper for smoke control- Adjustable door latch helps retain heat and smoker- Rear-mounted handle and wheels for easy mobility Specifications: - Weight: 53 lbs.- Heating Element: 800 watt- Length: 20""- Width: 20.1""- Height: 34.4""- Cooking Capacity: 2 cu. ft.- Cooking Space: 721 sq.""- Color: Black with stainless steel door
feature_bullets: Integrated Bluetooth technology-control your smoker with your smart device
721 sq. inch of cooking space with four chrome-coated smoking racks
800 watt heating element for even, consistent smoking up to 275 Degree
